Test.name: Basic inter platform communication
Test.WhatTest: Test the correct handling of the :reply-to slot of an ACL message.
Test.HowWorkTest: An agent is created on a remote platform and then a ping message is sent to it
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the agent on the remote platform receives the ping message and replies correctly and no exception is fired.

Test.name: Reply-to
Test.WhatTest: Tests sending and receiving a message to/from an agent on a remote platform.
Test.HowWorkTest: The Tester agent sends a message to agent A specifying B in the reply-to slot. Agent A creates a reply and puts the sender of the incoming message in the reply-to slot of the reply. B does the same so that the Tester should get back a reply from B
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the tester gets back a reply from B

Test.name: Message Envelope transfer
Test.WhatTest: Test the correct transfer of the Message Envelope in communication across different platforms.
Test.HowWorkTest: A message is exchanged between two agents living on different platforms with an Envelope including two properties: a Serializable object and a String.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the received Envelope includes the properties as they were set.

Test.name: Incoming message routing
Test.WhatTest: Test the "incoming message routing" mechanism i.e. the case where a message is delivered to an agent on a remote platform and living on a container different from that where the MTP that receives the message is installed.
Test.HowWorkTest: A ping message is exchanged between two agents living on different platforms with an Envelope including two properties: a Serializable object and a String.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the agent on the remote platform receives the ping message and replies correctly and no exception is fired.

Test.name: Payload ASCII encoding
Test.WhatTest: Test the sending of accentuated characters using the default ASCII charset
Test.HowWorkTest: The sender sends a message which content contains accentuated characters
Test.WhenTestPass: The test is expected to fail: the agent on the remote platform receives the message without the accentuated characters.

Test.name: Payload UTF-8 encoding
Test.Argument: This test is meant to succeed
This test is meant to fail
Test.WhatTest: Test the sending of accentuated characters using the UTF-8 charset. There are two parameters: "pass" to tell if the test shall pass or failed and "charset" to set the charset encoding to be tested.
Test.HowWorkTest: The sender sends a message which content contains accentuated characters
Test.WhenTestPass: The agent on the remote platform receives the message with the accentuated characters.
